import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; import { Store, ShoppingCart, User, Share2, Instagram, Facebook, MessageCircle } from 'lucide-react'; export default function Home() { const { currentUser, userType } = useAuth(); const shareStore = (platform) => { const message = "Check out this amazing mobile store app! Create your own store or shop from local sellers."; const currentUrl = window.location.href; const url = currentUrl.split('/store/')[0]; let shareUrl = ''; switch(platform) { case 'whatsapp': shareUrl = `https://wa.me/?text=${encodeURIComponent(message + ' ' + url)}`; break; case 'facebook': shareUrl = `https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=${encodeURIComponent(url)}`; break; case 'instagram': // Instagram doesn't support direct sharing, so we'll copy to clipboard navigator.clipboard.writeText(message + ' ' + url); alert('Link copied! Share it on Instagram'); return; default: return; } window.open(shareUrl, '_blank'); }; if (currentUser && userType === 'seller') { return (

Seller Dashboard

Manage your store and track sales

Welcome back, Seller!

My Store Products

Share Your Store

Grow your business by sharing your store on social media

); } if (currentUser && userType === 'buyer') { return (

Track your orders and discover amazing products

Welcome back, Buyer!

My Orders Browse Stores
); } return (

For Sellers

Create your store, add products, and share your store link

2

3

Track Orders

Both sellers and buyers can track order status

); }
